title: Ep. 132 - It's Time to Buy Stocks
itunes:title: It's Time to Buy Stocks
description: Dr. David Eifrig, editor of Retirement Millionaire, says investors should be buying stocks right now. He also discusses why you should avoid gold for the moment - and how banks could offer huge returns for patient investors. This week's special: .
